title: Sin Committed Dua
description: Authentic supplications for Sin Committed Dua
seoContent: Authentic invocations and supplications for Sin Committed Dua. Derived from reliable sources including Hisnul Muslim.

items.title: Dua 140
items.arabic: ((مَا مِنْ عَبْدٍ يُذنِبُ ذَنْباً فَيُحْسِنُ الطُّهُورَ، ثُمَّ يَقُومُ فَيُصَلِّي رَكْعَتَيْنِ، ثُمَّ يَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ إِلاَّ غَفَرَ اللَّهُ لَهُ)).
